Package it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class TimerConstrainedEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.TimerConstrainedEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventHandler, java.lang.Runnable
    public class TimerConstrainedEventHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
implements EventHandler
    Handler class for events received by the client. Extends EventHandler, adding a timing functionality to limit the time the player has for a single action. In the default behaviour, it notifies the observer after it ended without being blocked by the related requestDispatcher.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • checkFinished

        public boolean checkFinished()
        Check if the timer is already finished. If finished:
      • Sets active to false, to avoid further requests to pass through and stop running the Thread..
      • Clear the options showed to the view
      • Notifies all the players of the lack of response from the player
Returns:
